welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Massapequa, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Welcome and have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: International flights for major airlines such as Air France, Lufthansa, and Japan Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Mainly used by Delta Air Lines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the newest terminals, serving international flights for major airlines such as British Airways, Emirates, and Singapore Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Used exclusively by JetBlue for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves international flights for major airlines such as British Airways, United Airlines, and ANA.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Mainly used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic logins.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
